title: Zephyr Heights
description: Vana Carpenter is dragged kicking and screaming to New York. All of her friends are back in Colorado, her dad has suddenly become a workaholic and her mother is having a hard time adjusting. But when Vana meets Nate McLeod there are instant sparks, a flame igniting that could consume everything around them.Amongst a series of abrupt changes and strange encounters, Vana is forced to call everything she knows into question. What starts as a fling with an edgy, unpredictable guy quickly turns into a deeper connection with life or death consequences. There are dark forces seeking to use Vana, for what she doesn't know. Nate and his family have been protecting her, but can she really rely on them? Vana tries to remain strong throughout these abnormal trials of adolescence, but she can't help but feel vulnerable as dark and light battle for the ability to control her. Not knowing who she can trust or where she can hide, Vana has to take command and decide her own destiny.
author: David Fumarola
